body_html:
that looks like a botched install. What is the output of the following commands:

ls /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/
ls /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib
ldd /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C*.so*

body:
that looks like a botched install. What is the output of the following commands:

```
ls /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/
ls /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib
ldd /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C*.so*
```
